devdoc.details: A simple global constraint to cap the number of tokens.

getParametersHash(address,uint256).details: calculate and returns the hash of the given parameters

params._cap: the cap to check the total supply against.
params._token: the token to add to the params.

params._paramsHash: the parameters hash to check the total supply cap against.

pre(address,bytes32,bytes32).details: check the constraint after the action. This global constraint only checks the state after the action, so here we just return true:

setParameters(address,uint256).details: adding a new set of parameters

params._cap: the cap to check the total supply against.
params._token: the token to add to the params.

when().details: when return if this globalConstraints is pre, post or both.
when().return: CallPhase enum indication  Pre, Post or PreAndPost.

devdoc.title: Token Cap Global Constraint
